review_content:
Bel colore intenso, schiuma abbondante.
Aroma fruttato e speziato, gusto morbido.
La mia weizen preferita.

수도원에서 시작했지만 현재는 민간이 상업적으로 운영하다보니 트라피스트 에일이라 할 순 없고 애비에일이라 하는데 뭐 맛이면 맛, 가격이면 가격 모두를 이뤄냈으니

트라피스트면 어떻고 애비면 어떻습니까. 이걸 편의점 밀맥주로 언제어디서든 2,500원에 마실 수 있다는게 축복이지요.

그리고 사실 파울라너 바이스비어는 예전에 헤페 바이스비어 나투르트륍(Paulaner Hefe Weissbier Naturtrub)에서 이름과 맛이 변했다라는 이슈가 있었는데

헤페라는 말을 뺏듯이 효모를 다 날려버렸는진 모르겠지만 파울라너 코리아에선 단지 이름과 캔 디자인만 바뀐거고 레시피에는 변함이 없다고 답을 해줬습니다.

그러려니하며 요즘엔 편의점 밀맥주만 보더라도 국내외의 너무나도 다양한 라인업이 있다보니 한동안 멀리하다가 오랜만에 마셔봤는데 캬~라는 말이 절로 나오네요.

잔에 따르면 탁한 호박색의 외관에 헤드는 높게 쌓였다가 필요한만큼만 남기고 사라지는데, 정리된 헤드는 조밀한게 보기 좋으며 부서지는 포말처럼 아름답습니다.

코로 느껴지는 향은 상쾌하면서도 달달한 정향과 꽃냄새, 입으로 들어오는 느낌은 솜사탕을 입속에 구겨넣듯 부드럽고 포근하지만 바디감은 은근히 있어서 벌컥벌컥 마시진 못하죠.

밀과 할러타우(Hallertauer Taurus) 홉 특유의 바나나 풍미에  탄산감은 적지도 많지도않는 좋은 타협점에 위치하고 있으며

그덕에 삼킬때까지도 시종일관 부드럽다. 그렇지만 그 맛은 단순하지않은데 스파이시하고 단내가 있는 클로브에 감귤의 향과 살짝 어우러지면서

피니쉬엔 밍밍한 파인애플이나 익었다고 할 수 없는 메론의 맛까지 느낄 수 있는데 아참 이거 헤라클레스(Herkules) 홉입니다. 그 완성도가 너무 좋네요.

역시 구관이 명관이라고 파울라너 바이스비어는 바이젠의 교과서이더라구요. 이렇게 말하면 웃기지만 국내 크래프트 비어에서 어슬프게(물론 심사숙고의 결과물이란걸 알지만 결국 돌아와서 파울라너를 마셔보면 대충만든 것 같다..)만든 밀맥주를 마셔보면 그렇게 어색할 수가 없는거죠.

아 물론 파울라너 만큼 맛있는 맥주는 많지만 중요한건 파울라너만큼 저렴한 맥주는 없다는 것.

​

C: amber
N: esters, banana, spicy
P: wheat, ripe banana, light clove, touch of hay, grain dust, pretty much a classic in the style.

Excellent citrus, banana aroma. Some maltiness is also there. Head is impressive. Lasts for long. Blurry golden body.
Soft, fruity and with hoppy aftertaste.

Can, 50 cl @summerhouse. Pours an unclear golden with a frothy white head. Aroma is malty with a whiff of hops. Taste is malty sweet with a toasty and a little sour aftertaste. Oily mouthfeel. Medium carbonation. Low bitterness. Nice and refreshing.

0,5l bottle from store, drinking at home 09/07/2021 BB 02/22 also tried the can in Munich, had this one so many times. Pours a nice cloudy orangy amber with big, creamy white foam on top, long lasting with good lacing. Aroma is a little more yeasty and bready, but also quite flowery with cloves and banana notes. Taste is delicious with a malt base and also a good wheat sourness, balanced and interesting with cloves, white pepper, caramel, banana and citrus flavours and a slightly spicy and sweet finish. Medium body and creamy mouthfeel, medium carbonation. This one and the Franziskaner Hefe-Weissbier were among my first non-industrial lagers also due to the large distribution and availability and also cheap price, same as in the german stores. This one is slightly more sour but also quite sweet overall, but still a perfect exemple of this style and always a solid choice.
Een frisse weizen met een klein zuurtje en een waterig smaakje. Maakt geen expliciete indruk

Een van de meest lekkere weissbieren, geur van tarwe, gist, banaan, perzik, citrusvruchten en kruidig.  Smaak is vol, romig, kruidnagel, banaan en citroen.  Afdronk is lichtbitter en droog. Smaakt naar meer.

zapach: banan, goździki 
smak: goździki, banan, lekko kwaśny, troszkę słodki, goryczka niska,
I had it from the bottle.  The aroma is banana, spice, and wheat.  The taste is the same with some citrus.  It's pretty flavorful and has a nice spice to it.  There's a nice carbonation.  It's good.

W aromacie: banan, zboże, ciasto drożdżowe, goździki.
Smak zbalansowany, lekko kwaskowy, goździkowy, lekko bananowy, ale taki pusty i płaski.
Pełnia średnioniska, goryczka niska, nagazowanie średnioniskie.
Piwo w porządku, ale polskie browary kraftowe robią lepsze weizeny.
Murky orange pour with minimal white head. Aroma musty citrus. Taste follows nose. Enjoyable.

Bottle. Nose is clover, yeast, wheat, banana, hint of bubble gum.  Taste is wheat, lemon, banana, bubble gum, leading to cloves, hint of spice, yeast and bread, with a light herbal hop note. 

Classic.

Belle complexité aromatique sur cette Hefeweissbier avec une excellente complexité qui aurait mérité une meilleure vivacité pour être réellement au top. Mais avec seulement 5,5 %, on ne peut que saluer le résultat, d'autant que l'alcool ne se laisse pas prendre à revers par la douceur. Du côté du visuel, rien d'extraordinaire : un blond opaque surmonté d'une mousse blanchede3 mm. Le nez laisse percevoir un joli cocktail autour de la banane, du pain, de la pomme, de la pêche relevé par du girofle. Dès l'attaque un léger poivre vient en plus réhausser l'ensemble. On est alors agréablement surpris par la densité et la profondeur aromatique. Une très légère acidité, donnant une touche de la fraîcheur est également présente. La seconde bouche est globalement linéaire. On regrette alors un alcool qui manque de tonus. Mais l'arrière-bouche, ample et riche est là pour nous consoler. Le final, toujours par cet alcool un peu faiblard manque de vivacité avec une douceur trop prononcée. Une belle palette et une richesse aromatique...pour un tel titrage, cela est déjà une très belle prestation.

Pomarańczowe, równomiernie zmętnione z obfitą pianą - wygląda modelowo. W aromacie głownie chlebowo-bananowe, są też akcenty goździka i drożdży. W smaku dość wytrawne, goździka trochę więcej, pojawiają się też lekkie fenole w typie wanilii, ale wciąż na pierwszym planie pszeniczna słodowość.Słodycz kontrowana jest przez umiarkowaną kwasowość, a na finiszu mam nawet wrażenie leciutkiej goryczki, dzięki czemu piwo jest naprawdę rześkie i pijalne. Bardzo klasyczny i bardzo smaczny (do ideału brakuje mi nieco więcej fenolowości, ale z drugiej strony to tylko moje osobieste preferencje).
Bel colore intenso, schiuma abbondante. Aroma fruttato e speziato, gusto morbido.…
수도원에서 시작했지만 현재는 민간이 상업적으로 운영하다보니 트라피스트 에일이라 할 순 없고 애비에일이라 하는데 뭐 맛이면 맛, 가격이면 가격 모두를 이뤄냈으니…
C: amber N: esters, banana, spicy P: wheat, ripe banana, light clove, touch of hay, grain dust, pretty much a classic in the…

Excellent citrus, banana aroma. Some maltiness is also there. Head is impressive. Lasts for long. Blurry golden body.
Soft, fruity and with hoppy aftertaste.

Can, 50 cl @summerhouse. Pours an unclear golden with a frothy white head. Aroma is malty with a whiff of hops. Taste is malty sweet with a toasty and a little sour aftertaste. Oily mouthfeel. Medium carbonation. Low bitterness. Nice and refreshing.

0,5l bottle from store, drinking at home 09/07/2021 BB 02/22 also tried the can in Munich, had this one so many times. Pours a nice cloudy orangy amber with big, creamy white foam on top, long lasting with good lacing. Aroma is a little more yeasty…
Een frisse weizen met een klein zuurtje en een waterig smaakje. Maakt geen expliciete indruk

smak: goździki, banan, lekko kwaśny, troszkę słodki, goryczka niska,
I had it from the bottle.  The aroma is banana, spice, and wheat.  The taste is the same with some citrus.  It's pretty flavorful and has a nice spice to it.  There's a nice carbonation.  It's good.

Bottle. Nose is clover, yeast, wheat, banana, hint of bubble gum. Taste is wheat, lemon, banana, bubble gum, leading to cloves, hint of spice, yeast and bread, with a light herbal hop note.…

Pomarańczowe, równomiernie zmętnione z obfitą pianą - wygląda modelowo. W aromacie głownie chlebowo-bananowe, są też akcenty goździka i drożdży. W smaku dość wytrawne, goździka trochę więcej, pojawiają się też lekkie fenole w typie wanilii,…

Il colore è un arancione ambrato torbito e la schiuma è abbondante e pannosa. Il profumo è caratterizzato dal frumento con in più delle note fruttate di banana, mango e agrumi. Il gusto è delicato, bene bilanciato tra gli ingredienti e ciò che spicca sono i cereali accompagnati da sfumature fruttate e per finire un retrogusto acidulo. Il corpo è medio e pastoso, però è molto beverina e fresca da gustare in qualsiasi occasione. Un’ottima weiss!

500ml can. Dark cloudy gold, big white foamy head, lovely retention and lacing. Fruity aroma of banana, yeast, sweet doughy malts. Smooth taste but not too creamy, fruity with a good honest malt background, tasty without it standing out. Nice soft carbonation. Its certainly good but underwhelming considering I've just had a random Czech Pilsner which I've rated higher than this top 50 Weissbier classic. Beer can always be surprising.

Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień. Degustacja odbyła się jakiś czas temu.
Instagram/czgr_

Smells very bready and yeasty with a little bit of banana. Pours a very active and tall off-white head. Tastes very bready and yeasty with a nice thick mouthfeel to top it off. After doing the old swish and pour I get a banana taste. Very good for drinking slow and sipping, but not sure if I could drink more than one in an hour. Overall it’s great, thick and bready in a very good way. Haven’t had many wheat beers but this is the best one so far.
Sweet wheat and yeast aroma. Prominent banana-and-clove note. Taste on the sweeter side, yeast present. Wheat driven medium body. Creamy and smooth on the palate. Bit fizzy. Relatively dry finish.
Old rating from 2016 - 500ml bottle. Pours hazy orange with a large white creamy head. Aromas & tastes of banana, mango, pineapple, clove & yeast. Medium body. Smooth crisp finish

Ampolla 50 cl supermercat Plus. Clàssica Weiss Bier. Bon color, dit d espuma amb correcta retenció. Bon cos, notes de plàtan, llevat, maltosa... Final amb lleu punt especiat fantàstic. Impossible demanar més per 1,30 € en qualsevol supermercat

Wygląd: ciemnozłote, zmętnione piwo z umiarkowaną, drobno- i średniopęcherzykową, utrzymującą się pianą

Aromat: banan, goździki, niestety także lekka nuta metaliczna

Smak: w smaku przeważają goździki, z ciekawym, intensywnym pszenicznym finiszem 

Posmak w ustach: piwo rześkie, mocno wysycone, pijalne, z odpowiednią ilością ciała

As far as classics go, this right up there for me, probably the first hefeweizen I ever had. Pours a cloudy gold with a big, frothy white head, and a wonderful yeasty aroma of malt, banana and sugary sweetness with some vanilla essence in there too. The mouthfeel is grainy and creamy, the tastes from the aroma building into the finish, leaving a dry and sweet aftertaste

Nearly exploded out of the bottle. Pours out extra cloudy gold/orange with thick foamy head. Aroma has banana, clove, and barnyard. Taste is heavily spicy clove and white pepper with banana and dough. Palate is effervescent and oily.

Geruch: muffig Gräser
Farbe:dunkel gelb trüb
Geschmack: bananig hefig sehr gutes Weizen
Blond trouble, très fine et abondante  mousse blanche. Arômes : banane, orange, céréales, levure. Bonne acidité et amertume en retrait. Recette aussi belle que bonne.

Hazy, golden. With a generous and lasting white head.
Aroma: Bread, bisquit, honey. Yeast - fruits and vanilla.
Flavor: More of the same but also some citrus and a mild bitterness.
Creamy mouthfeel. Low/medium carbonation
Pours hazy with a substantial white head. Pleasant banana, orange aroma. Smooth mouthfeel with a fruity, yeasty and lightly spiced taste.

0.5 Can from local store (as Paulaner Weissbier)

Pours caramel color with a thick stable head. Smell of yeast. Rich wheat taste. Pretty soar. Bitter. I'm not fan of wheat beers. I don't like it.

Uopšte mi se ne svidja, intenzivan ukus pšenice i kvasca.

I'll be honest, there's not much more I can add about this beer that you don't already see in my Erdinger review. I will say though I enjoy Paulaner more because 1) it feels a little smoother and has better drinkabaility to me, I can taste the citrus notes a bit better in the beer, which is what made wheat beers so popular in the US 15 yeara ago, and 3) the logo and glassware is just better. If you're looking for a solid wheat beer that won't knock you out of your chair or redefine what you like you've, you've found your match.

A beer that I have tried at several opportunities. The last time was during the summer 2019 and my last trip to Munich at 2018. The color is yellow/orange and troubled, normal carbonation for the style, white foam. For a mass production, this one is correct, I could say a reference, a classic with notes of wheat, banana, rather fruity and aromatic, smooth at the palate, discreet note of hop at the final that it is normal for the style.

Whole box of cans from online shop.

Very hazy orange color, the strong aroma of fermentation and thick taste of the body make this a great beer. Drink this with several gulps without any hesitation.

Pours cloudy orange with full foam top. Classic yeasty banana spice scent. Taste also sweet and spicy with crisp bitter finish. Medium bodied smooth texture average to full carbonation and a crisp finish. Something of a classic and this is a belated review since it became staple beer for me during a hot Atlanta summer when a local bar had it on draft. So drinking it in Italy to celebrate proving for the second time in 4 days that I am negative for covid 19, and have not brought Boris's improved variant to spoil everyone's Christmas. Even so, the festivities in Italy this year will be muted.
Bottle. Hazy, amber color, fine white head. Banana fruity, spices, clove aroma. Dry taste, low bitterness. Fruity, banana, clove spicy aftertaste. Full body, high carbonation.
500 ml bottle for sleep late night. Pour with white lasting head, and nice orange to amber color. Task great with lasting aroma. Solid Palate. Great Hefe to visit often!

Wygląd: piana śnieżnobiała, intensywna, drobniutka, pięknie oblepia szkło, trwałość całkiem ok, po kilku minutach zostaje centymetrowa warstwa i piękny lacing. Barwa piwa ciemnozłota, wyraźnie zmętnione.

Aromat: zdecydowanie na pierwszym planie goździk, do tego przyjemne słodowe nuty typowe dla pszenicznego słodu. Owocowość na średnim poziomie, głównie banan i gruszka z lekkim dodatkiem gumy balonowej. Przyjemnie, aczkolwiek owocowa część mogłaby być intensywniejsza.

Smak: bardzo lekkie orzeźwiające, delikatnie kwaskowe, wyraźny posmak goździka w smaku, przyjemne posmaki zbożowe, gładkie, goryczka niska ziołowa i klasyczna.
this is the reference example when it comes to the style. It is a non-sweet hefe (contrary to franziskaner). My preferred hefe.

Wygląd: Barwa żółta, zamglona. Piana biała, średniowysoka, zbudowana głównie z drobnych i średnich oczek, opada do sporej ostatniej warstwy, pozostawiając lekki lacing.
Aromat: Zbalansowany, średnio intensywny. Na średnim poziomie bananowe estry oraz goździkowe fenole. Niska słodowość pszeniczna, chlebowa. W tle akcenty wanilii. 
Smak: Odrobinę bardziej wygładzony ze składowymi z aromatu. Na niskim poziomie pojawia się guma balonowa. W ustach półwytrawne, treściwość średnioniska i gładka, wysycenie średniowysokie. Goryczki brak. Finisz półwytrawny z goździkami, bananem, słodowością pszeniczną oraz nutą gumy balonowej.

Bière 50 cl achetée chez Intermarché. Nez de blanche typique, agréable, citronné. Bouche fraîche, acidulée, une blanche allemande dans les règles de l'art, réussie mais ce n'est pas mon style de bière. (M)
Bière achetée chez Intermarché. Robe blonde, collerette fine de mousse qui tient. Belle robe dorée. Agréable en bouche avec un léger piquant persistant. Une bonne blanche.
Piwo zółte z białą pianą, wyraźnie zmętnione. W aromacie goździki, troche guma balonowa, a w tle banany. W smaku wytrawne, znowu trochę guma balonowa, podwyższona kwaśność, goździki
Cloudy orange body, white head.  Sweet wheat aroma.  Sweetish wheat taste with a light citrus tang in the finish

Though I had rated this one like 2 years ago but apparently not. 500ml bottle. Bit cloudy amber + white head. Sweet wheaty, sweet bready malt, banana + clove, orange peel, light stone fruit, light grassy, light white pepper, light bitterness, light metallic maybe? bit high carb. V solid hefe, can't go wrong with this one

Can @ Friends/Panzer. Appearance: pours unclear golden/orange with good soapy white head and lacing. aroma/taste: barley, bread, wheat, light oranges, light banana, light fruity, light spices, light honey and grassy notes. palette: medium yeasty aroma, light to average carbonation, medium body, medium to notable sweetness, somewhat balanced by a light to medium bitterness, average duration, sweet finish and watery texture. Overall: Classic weizen

Aromat: banan, guma balonowa, przyprawy, goździk, przyjemny, słodko; 
Wygląd: pomarańczowy, zmętnione, ładna piana
Smak: słodkie, guma balonowa, banan, trochę przypraw, goryczka niska
Podniebienie: pełne, gładkie, wydaje się nisko nasycone

Aroma of yeast, wheat and mild banana
Nice light orange colour with thin small head
Nice taste of dominant yeast, wheat, banana, mild alcohol
Very foamy mouthfeel with soft carbonation
Decent
Almost amber colour with foamy white head. Aroma dominated by yeast. Taste is round and mainly wheat, banana, alcohol and yeast. Lasting taste.

wheat bear steong wheat . cleanish.
yeast taste. not bad 3.5->2.2
다시먹어보니 빵맛 최악

Bottle from Marks & Spencer’s. Pours murky amber with a big white head . Aroma of banana , doughy bread, clove , pepper & some orange. Taste of more banana,clove,bread ,citrus & pepper. On the light side of medium bodied with a smooth slightly full mouthfeel & ok carbonation. The finish is dry and spicy with more pepper,banana, clove & bread .

Bue le 2016/08/27 - Bouteille 50cl
Mousse : Chapeau blanc et compact
Couleur : Orange foncé et profond, très trouble
Nez : Frais, froment, herbe puis banane en réchauffant
Bouche : Attaque touche acidulée, douce et ronde de froment, ensuite vient sucre candy orangé. Final amertume fumée puis notes de banane en réchauffant, corps consistant.
Avis : Douce et rafraichissante, beaucoup de caractère, corps et amertume.

Od lutego chyba zmienili etykietkę, ta nowa wydaje mi się bardziej udana z ładnymi listkami, rzecz gustu oczywiście. Pomarańczowe, piana gęsta, kremowa, trwała. Zapach niewyraźny, jak na piwo pszeniczne to mało owocowy, nie do końca "czysty", zwiastuje goryczkę w smaku, dopiero po dłuższym ogrzaniu pachnie troszkę mocniej i nawet dość ładnie - drożdże, zboże, lekki chmiel. W smaku poprawne z zaznaczoną goryczką, ale nieco za ostre, jednak zawsze takie było odkąd pamiętam. Znać wprawdzie banan, pomarańczę, drożdże ale tworzą one trochę szorstką, niespójną całość. Smak dość ciężki a zarazem piwo wydaje się być wodniste.
Ogólnie: Paulaner Hefe lepszy niż kiedyś ale oczywiście bez rewelacji.

APARÊNCIA
amarelo dourado, turvo.
creme branco de excelente formação e persistência.
AROMA
intenso.
banana, cravo, pão e leve cítrico.
SABOR
malte, banana e leve cravo.
SENSAÇÃO
corpo medio, média carbonatação e final seco.

Pours hazy orange amber with a three finger, white head.  Aroma is dried fruit, caramel and spice.  Taste is caramel and fig, moving to banana, clove and wheat.  Finish is banana, caramel and clove.  Good hefe.

From under a soft mound of foam comes a cloudy, pale yellow-brown glass of carbonated delight. Aroma flitters among cloves, bananas, yeast and pepper. A great example of a style that perfectly breaks the summer buzz of pilsners, lagers and IPAs. From an 11.2-oz bottle with an "enjoy before end of August 2020" notation. Done.

500ml bottle. Pours a hazy medium gold, with a large white head. Spice, banana, soft fruit aromas. Little spice up front, light body, fruitiness to the finish. Surprised not to have rated this already - no way I haven't had it before.

Bottle 500 ml at ABV 5.5 % from Wine Rack, Turnham Green. Surprised I haven't rated this yet as I've certainly had it before. Aroma is yeasty with notes of orange peel and citrus and spices (cumin?). Pours hazy orange body with big white head. Taste is yeast, orange, banana, malt, spices.
Medium body with fast rising bubbles, sweat malt flavor with notes of bannana and spices, no alcohol or hop bitter noticeable. One of the best beers in the kind
Cerveza clara color amarillo ocre, espuma que perdura, balance entre amargor y dulzura. Toques frutales, ligero sabor a platano

Nice aroma of bubble gum, and some fruity essence.  Deep gold color with a huge tan head.  Lots of staying power.  Sweet up front.  Fruity notes, bible gum, peeper and some coriander.  Finish is more on the bitter side with an echo of pepper and bubble gum.  Older sample from can so guessing lost some flavor.  Ok.

Poured from 330ml bottle into pint glass. A 2"+ pillowy off white head drops slowly with abundant lacing. Color is cloudy yellow-orange. Aroma of banana and bubble gum yeast with a grainy backbone and little hop presence. Mouthfeel is highly carbonated and crisp with a dry somewhat astringent finish. Flavors of wheat bread, cracker, lemon. Overall: excellent within the style.
Exelente weisbier, cerveza de trigo blanca, olor y sabor a plátano, un gran equilibrio entre su dulzor y amargor, muy refrescante, tomar fría, gran espuma que perdura, cuerpo medio, salud!
Yellow colored beer with a good white head. Taste is malty, wheat, some bananas, some sweetnes and refreshing.

Tölkki @ Prisma Raksila. Kaatuu vehnäolut-lasiiin kullankeltaisena ja sameana, upean vaahtokukan suojaamana, klassisen kaunis vehnis. Tuoksu on hyvin sitruksinen ja käyneen banaaninen, hieman mausteita ja vehnäistä viljaisuutta on myös mukana. Maku on ensin sitruksinen, mausteitakin on reilusti, jälimaussa vilajinen pureskeltavuus ja vehnän kuohkeus tuntuu, banaani on lievänä mukana, mutta sivuosassa. Suutuntuma on melko hiilihappoinen ja keskitäyteläinen, hiven makeakin. Perusvehnis eli todella taitavasti tehty olut, kaikki maut kohdillaan.

A dark golden cloudy beer that produces a large foam.
A malty flavour throughout with hints of clove.
Pours golden amber with visible carbonation and a generous head. Aroma of bananas and cloves, which also come through in the slightly sweet taste. Refreshing on a hot summer’s day.
Goudgeel weißbier met een mooie diepe oranje gloed en een volle dikke witte schuimkraag. Lichtfruitig van smaak, lichte banaan en sinastoets.

Barwa bursztynowa, zamglone.
Piana biała, obfita, zdobi szkło.
W aromacie banan i nuty przyprawowe.
W smaku średnia pełnia, jest gładkie, trochę słodkie, banan i przyprawy średnio intensywne.
Pours hazy amber with a fluffy white head. Aroma of cloves. Taste has banana and cloves, sweet malt. Palate has nutmeg and cloves. Slightly watery. Meh.

Haven’t had this one in years. Used to order it on tap. Poured from a pint can into a Hefeweizen glass. Beautiful pour (almost a true draft pour look); thick, foamy head with yellow-light orange hue. Nose is banana, and the taste matches it with a hint of cloves. Very refreshing and perfect for summer. Incredible value, too. Got four pints at Total Wine Route 92 in DE for under $8. Cheers!
Murky gold pour, small head. Banana and clove aroma, creamy spice flavour, classic stuff.
Weissbier with a classical aroma and look. A bit too watery for me. Level of carbonation could be higher.

Hay que verterla con mimo, en ángulo de 45º dentro del vaso, preferiblemente alto, el típico de la cerveza de trigo. Así caerá sin hacer demasiada espuma hasta el final, en el que se vuelca la botella.
Ámbar, buen cuerpo opaco y la susodicha espuma con gran permanencia, en nariz aromas a frescor (se recomienda servirla muy fría), cereal y diversas frutas.
Rica y untuosa en boca, llena de matices: trigo, lúpulo, frutas tropicales, cítricos (por eso hay bares que la sirven, oh sacrilegio, con una rodaja de limón). No abunda en gas como algunas "primas" suyas alemanas y permite el trago corto, disfrutando del sabor, y el largo para impregnar más la boca.
Se bebe con gusto, una de las mejores cervezas industriales de trigo en el mercado, a años luz de otras marcas como Franziskaner. Muy recomendable, difícil de superar en una terraza para mitigar el calor.

Pours a murky honey gold with a full light white head which lingers.......aroma heavy on banana,  with lighter amounts of clove..........taste follows the aroma, full mouthfeel, touch of astringency near the end, with lingering clove.
Ładna piana, aromat bananowy. Piwo mętne, nieprzejrzyste, barwa pomarańczowa. Niska goryczka, trochę nut palonych.
Aroma intenso, e cor dourada turva e espuma branca. Sabor refrescante e encorpado.

In my opinion, and I have heard many people agree with me, Paulaner brew the best Weiss bier available. 
All Weiss beers will have a certain Banana Clove aroma to  them but the Paulaner just does it better, in a more balanced, nuanced way that really sets the bench mark for this style of beer. Show casing what has been possible for centuries Barnabas, the very recognisable monk in the logo motif, will make sure you are well looked after on the Weissbier front. 
Often you will notice this beer on keg at many of the trendier taprooms across  the capital, situated along side many of the most elaborate and tasty new wave craft beer. This is testament to its endurance. Indeed Paulaner,  rather than having to earn itself a place amongst world’s brewery,  has simply been vindicated as having done consistently what everyone’s now aspiring to do, siet 1635!
Love it

Bottle from Marks & Spencer.
Pours a hazy amber/orange colour with a large creamy white head. Aromas of bananas, cloves, wheat and bubblegum. Taste is very much the same as the aroma with the same notes. Fairly light bodied with a smooth slightly oily mouthfeel and a refreshing finish. Top wheat beer.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Semi-astringent but only as a subtle aftertaste. Not too bad, would drink maybe 2-3 in a session max
Классическое пшеничное немецкое пиво, внешний вид отличный, кремовая шапка и аромат пшеничного солода. Вкус насыщенный, послевкусие приятное, фруктовое непродолжительное

Fat på Club Princess Jandia Fuertoventura. 
Orange med stort skum. 
Ganska fyllig men ändå Lättdrucken, vete och lätt kryddighet.
Aroma : Wheat is very pronounced, undertone of sweet caramel malt, and hint of soft fruits.  Taste : As aroma. Pretty standard wheatbear, nothing wrong with it just not a standout
Very good beer, cloudy golden color, heavy creami head with good retention, bread aroma, medium body
Siempre es bueno tomarse esta estupenda cerveza de trigo. Con cuerpo, buen sabor y espuma perfecta si está bien servida.
Конечно, я пробовал баночное, но такого восторга, как пишут об этом немецком пиве, не ощутил. Достаточно обычное пиво. Ничего выдающегося. На один раз. Ну может на два.

Wygląd: Ciemnosłomkowa barwa, bardzo wysoka i trwała piana pozostawiająca wyraźny lacing na ściankach szkła.
Aromat: Słodki, lekko cytrusowy z bardzo wysokimi akcentami, jak na weizena przystało bananów i goździków
Smak: Mocno wysycone, cytrusowe, delikatnie bananowe. W ustach utrzymuje się chwilę posmak przypraw.

Acheté à la SAQ du centre ville de St-Hyacinthe. La bière est blonde un peu trouble avec un col fin et persistant. Au nez, je retrouve des odeurs de bananes. En bouche c’est très sucré et peu amer. On croirais une triple belge avec des notes de banane. C’est très agréable et très savoureux.

Hazy, medium orange color, stable, white, thick foamy head. 
Very typical GHW aroma: cloves, banana, fruity, malts. 
Taste is the best amongst the mass-produced GHW beers out there: perfect balance between malts, esters, carbonation, mouthfeel and spicy bitterness. A stunner. Maybe be best in its own league.
Paulaner is a nice German weiss beer, which has sweet orangy flavour. I can recommend it.

500ml bottle. Pour a cloudy orange-gold with a thick off-white head made up of tiny tightly packed bubbles. Aroma of banana, bread, clove, vanilla, pepper, bubblegum. Smooth, creamy mouthfeel. Medium body. Lots of lacing. Flavour of banana, spices, bread, vanilla, bubblegum, touch of citrus bitterness on the finish. A characterful weissbier.
Yellow/light orange colour. Its aroma could be stronger but the flavour is that of a great Weiss beer.

En copa, cerveza túrbia con una generosa capa de cremosa espuma blanco hueso. Aroma predominante a cereales, junto con pan, grano, levadura, plátano maduro y levadura. En boca, textura espesa, se carbonatación baja/media y amargor suave. Sabor dulzón a cereales blancos, con una mayor presencia de fruta madura como plátano, grano, pan y un fondo de levadura. Una Weissbier clásica, y a la vez de las mejores de su estilo, bien equilibrada y completa. Si la hay disponible, siempre la pido.
Big beautiful whitehead, very foamy. Very murky nice appearance. Fresh aroma, a little bit fruity and alcoholic.
One of the best of its kind. Fresh, delicious, all in the right place. Must
Aroma is bananas, sweet grains, and cloves. The taste is sweet wheat notes, bubblegum and banana esters.
трайна висока пяна, оранжев мътен цвят, леко ябълков и повече пшеничен аромат, хмел почти не се усеща. мек и приятен, леко кисел вайс.
Orange pour, cloudy, huge head.  Aroma and taste of wheat, banana, light apple, lightly hoppy.  Light to medium body.  Pairs well with Oktoberfest or Thanksgiving fare.

500ml bottle brewed in Germany at 5.5%. Dark murky orange/mango juice colour. Average-sized quickly-dissipating head. Prominent wheaty aroma with some banana underneath. Moderate carbonation. Citric hops are bridged with rather milder than usual fruity yeast into rusky, savoury wheat flavours that linger due to the thick texture of the beer. A good Weissbier, Paulauner style showing with more pronounced hops and a more targeted flavour profile, but I personally prefer it more when wheat beer stretches its legs and gets properly yeasty and fruity - this more straight-and-hop-forward example of the style makes a fine change, however.

13.10.2019
Jasno pomarańczowe. Mleczna mętność. 
Piana biała i drobna. Obfita i stabilna. 
Jest banan. Jest goździk. Pachnie słodko i przyprawowo. 
Dobrze nagazowane. Kwaskowe orzeźwiające. 
Smakuje jak porządna pszenica.
07.10.2019
Wizualnie jak rasowy weizen. Pięknie. 
Pół na pół w aromacie. W sensie banan z goździkiem. 
Smak też super. Ten duet jak wyżej też zrównoważony. 
Wysycenie wysokie. Lekka słodycz. Kwasku też nie brak. 
Wszystko co ma być jest. Klasyk w świeżej warce to jest to.

Отличное пшеничное пиво, очень много густой пены со сладковатым ароматом, очень мягкий насыщенный вкус, странноватый привкус. Послевкусие чуть горьковатое. Легко пьётся. Подходит для любой погоды и на любой случай.

7/10/2019. Tap at Grand Excelsior Hotel Munich Airport. Pours hazy orange gold with a foamy off-white head. Aroma of wheat, malt, hops, banana, fruit, yeast and a hint of peppery spice. Medium sweetness, light bitterness. Medium body, oily texture, soft carbonation. Pretty decent.

Canette datée du 14/05/2019, bue après 18 semaines. Robe jaune-blanchâtre moyennement trouble et surmontée d'un col de mousse blanc et dense. Arômes de banane, pain citronné, pomme, sucre à glacer, blé soyeux. En bouche, banane et orange, quelques épices, blé malté et épais, fruits du verger, miel. Finale dégageant de forts esters caractéristiques du style. Texture douce et légère, un peu aqueuse, corps mince. Un classique.
# 310; 5/2016. Hůře pitelné pšeničné pivo s výrazně nepříjemnou jablkovou vůní i chutí, doplněnou o již klasické banánové tóny. Patrně se na vlasnostech negativně projevilo předchozí skladování.

Az íze jó, kellemes kicsit citrusos.
Az ára már lehetne jobb is, elvileg nagyüzemi sör, mentségére legyen mondva a top 50 azért elárul róla valamit...

O bere din grâu cu un gust intens. Aromele fructate sunt remarcabile. Spuma este densă și se menține până spre final. Culoarea în pahar este una tulbure. Istoria Medievală a Paulaner și asocierea cu festivalul bavarez, OktoberFest o fac și mai specială.
Dintre berile weizen consumate de mine, Paulaner, este preferata mea.

Frothy bottle pour with a sizable head composed of small bubbles. Head dissipates quickly enough. Beer is cloudy, looking lighter and chilled at the edges with a deeper opaque amber centered. Smells mildly of sweet wheat. Mouthfeel is soft and smooth and a touch thin. Flavor has plenty of wheat, some apple, banana, and grape but not too sweet. Tasty warm or cold. Overall a great beer for relaxing.
Hosszan tartó habtartás. Testes, rostos állag. Sűrű színvilág. Pécsi búzasör is tudja hanem jobban amit hoz magával.
Lehet kicsit sokadik sör 🍺 volt de nem hozta azt az élményt, amit vártam volna. Íze nem nem túl markáns, ami nem túl jó. Nagy melegben esetlegesen kipróbálható.
Uzupełnienie ocen piwnych bez opisu z uwagi na przeniesienie z papierowych zapisków.
The first weizen I drank, and the one that made me fall in love with this type of beers. Still one of my favorite weizens
Bottle, 2019/09/11. Not that a weizen for a reference Hefeweizen. Darker, more body and more expression from the barley. Quite good, but maybe less drinkable or refreshing than other of the style.

Barwa zlota, piwo mętne, piana biała obfita.
Stylowe, dużo goździka i nuty banana, lekkie, minialnie słodkie, orzeźwiające.

Metro Cash & Carry Moldova 32.8 lei - 0.5 l
Aromă de  cuișoare , banane. Gust de hamei, citrice, pîine , un amar plăcut.Una dintre cele mai bune de acest gen.

A little bit of bitterness.
Nice foam.
I couldn't taste or smell classic wheat beer characteristics.
I remember enjoying it more before, maybe this was bad batch.
It was on discount.

I own to this beer because when i was a kid this beer was a prove that beers can be great. In my country was very difficult to find good beer in the bars or anywhere else but some places has this one and was the only option. 
Over time i tasted some better beers for sure but still i love this beer. The taste is like bitter and spicy with medium carboration and great mouthfeel. The aftertaste give you a strong barley that is somehow satisfied. Also the aroma is very spicy and wheaty.
Overall one of the best beers of the world. Not for the style but in general. When you want to drink some serious beer, "Paulaner" is one of the best option for you
Delle Paulaner una delle mie preferite!!! Un po' industriale ma tra le tipologie una preferita. Gradazione 5,5 gradi giusta

Bouteille de 50 CL achetée chez Auchan. Robe jaune orangée trouble avec une mousse blanche épaisse. Arômes de malts, banane, citron. Texture crémeuse, carbonatation moyenne, légère. Notes de fruitées de banane, malts, levures, miel. Finale sèche portée sur la banane.

Bottle (500ml bbe 0320) had a cafe bar Bristol in Zadar Croatia on freedom day August 5th (we fly home tomorrow) 2019 it's a 30c pours lovely and hazer look smells of banana and a slight vanilla taste what a beer
Best beer i've found....goes down really smooth.  Not much of a headache if you have too many.  Little squirt of lemon juice.  Best Hefeweizen i've found.
0,5l bottle. Pours hazy orange with big and lasting white head. Aroma of yeast, wheat and banana. Similar flavour.  Medium body and carbonation.

Hazy golden appearance. Frothy head.
Smell of wheat, yeast and bananas. Nourishing taste of wheat with a hint of cloves. A nice beer.
Soft bread taste with a hint of lemony wheat. “Liquid “ bread per the Germans.
Bottle from the local Lidl, pours murky amber-brown with a lasting foam and a spicy-yeasty and lightly banana nose. Sweet yet a bit thin and dry, good but not great.

Piwo mętne o barwie złotej z mega dużą pianą, która stopniowo opada pozostawiając ładny gruby kożuch.
W aromacie fenole, mus bananowy, drożdże.
W smaku dominuje banan, mniej goździki i końcowy akcent to drożdże.

When I think of a good Weiss beer, always Paulaner is the first on my mind. Very good aroma, the absolute icon of an appearance. Very good taste, malty, with very slight citrus notes, barely noticeable. Even more noticeable in the aftertaste. The only minus I can think of is that when you drink more than what you can handle it gets pretty hard on the next day. 😂

Schöne, kräftig orange Farbe. Ausgewogene Geschmacksnoten, gekochte Früchte und Spuren von Zitronenschale sind erkennbar. Schönes, sämiges Mundgefühl. Hintenraus kommen säuerliche Noten durch. Die Kohlensäure täuscht etwas mehr Substanz vor, als tatsächlich vorhanden ist. Für ein Industriebier echt ein gutes Weizen - auch Großbrauereien sind offenbar durchaus dazu in der Lage.
Great German wheat beer. A very strong flavorful hefeweizen. I would highly recommend it. Caramel color with rich white head. Perfectly balance flavors.
Tap from Guild Ale House, Preston. Hazy orange appearance. Aroma is wheat, banana and malt. Flavour is wheat, banana, malt and zesty.
Fľaška z drink shopu. Vôňa jemne kvasinkova. Farba zlatista. Chuť jemne kvasinkova.
Gran cerveza de trigo alemán de cuerpo y espuma densas, ligera en boca y muy refrescante

Less bitterness, sweetness like bread and honey.
Kind of medium body but also easy going taste.
Unbelievable drink! Don’t turn a pint of this down, gorgeous in all departments
Bottle and tap, hazy amber orange with a medium sized head. Nose and flavor are banana, lemons, clove, pepper, fruit, and spice. Medium bodied with refreshing finish. One of the best of the style.
Mooi donkerblond/oranje bier met romige witte schuimkraag die lang blijft. Banaan, tarwe, hooi, vanille, wit brood. Romig mondgevoel, laag in carbonatie. Zeer lekker witbier.
ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, w celu uzupełnienia profilu
Bevuta in bottiglia.  Ottima Weiss.  Profumata e piacevole al gusto. Tra le migliori della tipologia.
Opinia dodana na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w celu uzupełnienia profilu

Appearance: orange turbid with very abundant dense foam.
Aroma: Banana, A little caramel.
Taste: Banana sweetness wheat light sour Aftertaste with minimal hop bitterness.
Un'ottima weiss, bevuta in bottiglia, l'amaro non si sente, il sapore è ottimo

This hefe-weissbier is okay, but there are ones that deliver what a wheat beer should be, in my opinion.  It has the typical banana-like aromas and cloves.  I felt the mouthfeel was quite thin and was underwhelmed by this brew.  If you're fan of wheat beers, there are better representations, but still had to try since Paulaner has been known for quality brews, like their Dopplebock--my favorite in their lineup.  So, all in all, this was just decent beer.  When I am in the mood for a good wheat beer, I wouldn't gravitate towards this.  Who knows, though, this may be your thing.  The thing I will say that I did like was it was very easy drinking.

Cloudy orange pour with a massive thick foamy head. Huge malty aroma, wheat, brown bread, banana bread, banana. Softly sweet, softly bitter and a nice little acidity, great balance. Medium to full bodied with medium carbonation. This must be my favorite hefeweizen. The malty breadiness is awesome. Reminding me of walking passed a bakery in the morning and the smell of fresh baked bread brightens up your day. High end brew in my opinion.
Одно из эталонных представителей  пива. Нежный, приятный, ненавязчивый и ненадоедающий вкус за умеренную цену.

Giallo aranciato con cappello di schiuma compatto e persistente. Al naso apre con accenni di banana matura, albicocca, pesca gialla e continua su sentori di cereali. Nel complesso un naso meno dolce della media delle weiss. Al gusto è piacevole e equilibrata, con un tono luppolato presente che rende questa weiss piacevolmente equilibrata nei suoi toni dolci e amari. Buona.

26.04.19, butelka
W aromacie sporo banana, trochę zboża, muśnięcie goździków. Smak nieco bardziej w stronę zboża, banan nadal się utrzymuje, za to goździk gdzieś znika. Nasycenie niskie, oczekiwałem większego. Sprawia wrażenie dość pełnego, wydaje mi się, że powinno być nieco smuklejsze. Goryczka minimalna.

Aż szok, że dopiero przyszło mi wypić to piwo... Idealny wybór w miejscach gdzie brakuje czegoś lepszego, jak i coś, czym można zachęcić znajomych do poznania czegoś ciekawszego. Pięknie zmętnione, jednorodne, jasno-złote, z wysoką czapą piany. W aromacie mocno fenolowo, dalej przecier bananowy, drożdżówki, lekka nuta herbatnikowa. Wszystko na miejscu! Słodkie, mocno bananowe, troszkę goździka, drożdżowy finisz. Nie wiem czego więcej można oczekiwać od Weizena. Bardzo dobre i wypite z przyjemnością.
Bottle. Pours pale, cloudy orange with a foamy head. Aroma: Clove, banana, bread and grass. Taste is medium sweet with a light bitterness.
Definitely one of the best mass-produced German hefeweizens, on par with Benediktiner. Very distinct wheat taste and look.
Paulaner Hefe Weiss are culoare deschisa, corp dens si gust parfumat. Tehnic se prezinta ca avand aroma de garoafa (pentru cei care au mancat o garoafa), cu final sec.

Achetée à Casino supermarché 50cl (Villedieu-les-Poêles) DLC: 12/19
Nez de céréales
Robe blonde opaque avec des teintes d'orange
Mousse de bonne tenue et présente.
En bouche en ressens de la pêche douce, agrumes, ressenti frais, floral et herbacé.
Bulanık turuncu renkli, bol ve kalıcı köpüklere sahip. Muz ve mango gibi egzotik meyve kokularının hissedildiği, buğday maltı belirgin aromatik ve rahat içimli bir buğday birası.
Trübe Farbe mit mittelgroßer Schaumkrone. Fruchtiger Geruch. Viel prickelnde Kohlensäure. Geschmack nach Bananen, Malz, ein bisschen Zitrus. Großartiges Hefeweizen.
Bottle from BevMo Campbell.  Hazy amber yellow color.  Nice malty sweet banana Hefeweizen aroma.  Easy to drink.  Very good.
Ocena z pamięci w celu uzupełnienia profilu. Degustacja przed założeniem konta na RateBeer.
Nice flavor with reasonable price.I kind of like rich flavor but not much alcohol taste beer.Paulaner  is one of my favorite option.Smooth rich  wheat taste.Awesome!
Straszny słodziak się zrobił jak na weizena, przez słodkośc przebija się w zapachu goździk, w smaku banan, smaczne ale było lepsze...
Jasna barwa, piana niewysoka biała, z dużymi pęcherzykami. W aromacie banan i goździki. W smaku spora słodowość i przede wszystkim banan. Odświeżające. Klasyk.
Bière blonde trappiste, très savoureuse, mousse fine agréable. à boire très frais.

Two tone hazy golden color at bottom dark golden on top creamy foamy two finger head active carbonation smell of banana bread coriander  hops taste of citrus banana slight bitter finish hops very smooth to drink

Backlog z poprzedniego katalogu, ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z 28.08.2018

Update 18.07.2019: Pite w terenie. Zapach średniawy, ledwo wyczuwalne aromaty pszenicznego, a później wychodzi wada. W smaku całkiem niezłe, delikatne.
Немецкая классика. Прекрасный образец вайцена. Аромат банана и гвоздики. Вкус сладковатый с лёгкой кислинкой. На выдохе банан и гвоздика. Всё как положено.

Pora spróbować kolejnego klasyka. Niedawno był Franziskaner, teraz Paulaner.
Kolor jasno pomarańczowy, opalizujący, zmętniony. Piana obfita, biała, średnie oczka, opada wolno.
Nos: słody, banany,
Paszcza: czuć banany, lekka słodycz, ciało średnie w stronę niskiego, wysycenie średnie-gładkie, goryczki oczywiście brak, delikatne. Nie wyczułem gumy balonowej jak we Franziskaner, przez co nie mam odczucia mdłości. Podsumowując, w upalne lato trudno znaleźć lepsze piwo.
Erfrischend, süffig, fruchtig bananig, schönes orangetrübes Bierli mit feinem Schaum, einfach gut, macht Lust auf ein zweites Glas...

Una de las mejores cervezas en su estilo. Weissbier de referencia. Color amarillo anaranjado turbio. Espuma blanca cremosa y firme. Alta carbonatación y buen cuerpo. Aroma fresco, frutal y campestre. Plátano maduro y clavo. Gusto a cereal tostado, pan y levadura. Amargor bajo.

Me resulta extraño no haberla votado todavía pero aquí vamos... Cerveza de cuerpo y carbonatación media. Aroma a cítricos y plátano. En boca es refrescante, con una mezcla cítrica y herbácea. Una muy buena cerveza a un muy buen precio.

Stark hefiger Geruch. Naturtrüb, dicke Schaumkrone. Vollmundiger Antrunk. Aromatisch fruchtig, Banane und leicht Nelke. Cremig und nicht zu stark carbonisiert. Der herbe Nachgeschmack gefällt mir. Gutes Weizen
La cerveza de trigo más famosa del mundo. Color ámbar, espuma media, densidad media, fácil de beber, bastante completa.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
En klassisk hvedeøl af tysk oprindelse. Den har banan og nelliker i smagen som den skal have, ikke min favorit.

Color dorado oscuro turbio con espuma blanca alta que desciende lentamente con residuo medio. Aroma y sabor a cereal blanco y pan con notas a plátano y miel. Regusto dulce, sin apenas amargor y de corta duración. Textura semi-sedosa, cuerpo medio-denso y carbonatación baja. La cerveza de trigo más famosa del mundo, fácil de encontrar, fácil de beber y un tanto genérica, pero de excelente relación calidad/precio.
Kolor jasnożółty, piana gęsta i lepka. Zapach nijaki. Smak owocowy, dobry i leciutki. Goryczka ledwo wyczuwalna.

Color amarillo anaranjado, turbidez media. Dos dedos de espuma con buena retención. Aroma atrigo, levadura y ligero plátano. Gusto a trigo, levadura, ligero plátano, con un toque especiado y ligeramente amarga al final del trago. Cuerpo medio/alto. Una de las Hefeweizen más conocidas del planeta, está buena, pero a mí me aburre.
500ml bottle. Nice foam, taste is typical hefe without faults. Fruity end of gulps. It has very little hoppy aroma.
Taste is cloves, light bananas, wheat, clean water, vanilla, and light hop.
[But. 0,33] W aromacie banan. Piana nijaka, mętne. W smaku rozwodniony sok bananowy, jakby guma balonowa, nietypowa słodowość.

Really hazy light orange color with off-white head. Aroma has overripe banana, coriander and other yeast spices. Taste follows with banana notes and wheat sweetness, dough, bread and floral hops on the finish. Medium body and carbonation, quite smooth mouthfeel. A bit astringent on the finish but overall it's a legit weizen.

Forse la mia birra “industriale” preferita.
Corposa ma leggera e beverina, bella schiuma sia in bottiglia che alla spina. gusto ottimo. Una grande tedesca!

Aspecto hermoso. Perfecta definicion de lo que es una "hefeweizen" y el hecho de que sea sin filtrar la hace una de las mejores sino la mejor expresion de su estilo. Compite muy duro en la cima con la Weheinstephaner, Franziskaner y Schneider Weisse siendo el top 4 a mi gusto de este tipo de cerveza
Dobre, orzeźwiające, klasyczne piwo z wyczuwalnym aromatem bananów. Bardzo pijane.

Bottle. 04/19 Pours cloudy orange with creamy head. A: Orange peels, apple pie, clove T: medium saturation, medium body, yeasty, Orange peels, banana, clove, minimal bitterness, wheat malty

Can. 08/20. 0.5 l can. Pours hazy orange golden with massive thick head. A:orange peels, clove, T: mild carbonated, thin/medium body, Wheaty, spicy, minimal bitter,
Hazy unfiltered appearance thick white head. Citrusy scent and some bananas. Very pleasant. Tastes nice also lemony, citrusy, well balanced, highly drinkable. Really good beer.
Pivo odlične zlatne tamne boje, gusto dosta, pjena odlična... okus odličan... ne preferiram pšenično, ali Paulaner je brutalan
Kőkemény törtfehér színű hab. Illata vaníliás, ízben banán és narancs ízjegyekkel. Nagyon jó ivósör.
Uma boa representante da escola alemã. Ótima formação de espuma. Turva como deve ser. Sabor frutado, muita banana, cravo. Leve amargor. Vale muito a pena.
0,5l bottle. Pours hazy golden/straw with slightly off-white head. Aroma of banana, clove, spices, hint of citrus. Taste is identical, but without the citrus note.  Crisp, clean & refreshing.

0.5litre bottle, £2.50 from M&S, multibuy offer so good value. Best before 10.19. Served nice and cold in weizen glass. 

Hazy, orange, big fluffy yet solid head, dissipates mostly.

Aroma of clove, orange, banana, bubblegum.

Classic aroma and classic taste for the style. 
Nicely sweet. The clove and overripe banana dominate. Especially as the beer warms up.

Creamy mouthfeel, a nice hit of bitterness but mostly sweet.

One of my favourite beers. Very refreshing on hot days. Would pair well with lighter dishes. White fish, prawns.

Bouteille 50cl le 10/12/2018. DDM : 02/2019

Mousse : Blanche, grosses bulles, bonne tenue.
Liquide : Orange, trouble, beaucoup de bulles.
Nez : Levure, malt, céréales, agrumes, citron, banane.
Bouche : Même ligne que le nez, agrumes, citron, malt, céréales, levure, pain, abricot, pêche.
Palais : Carbonatation élevée, aqueuse, plutôt bien équilibré, longueur en bouche moyenne.

On draft at the Wirthaus in der Au. Pours a hazy, orange color, with a big, foamy, white head. The aroma is orange peel, cloves, biscuit dough, flour, and straw. Sweet and very yeasty. Light body, with a chewy, lively mouthfeel. This is a simple, clean, and quality hefeweizen. Very nice.

Pours a murky orange with lots of dense slightly off-white head, smells of bananas, sweat fruity taste which turns kind sour / bitter, kind of creamy texture. Probably the best common industrial wheat beer.

500ml can

Wheaty beer with a great pour, golden malt colour and a fine fluffy head!
Medium to strong body with a strong wheat flavour complimented by hints of sour dough, milk chocolate and macadamia nut at the mid pallet.
I would pair this with a Oliva Serie O cigar to get a caramel front pallet or a Gurkha Ninja to add a complex matrix of spice on the mid to back pallet which, will compliment the body of this beer.
Food wise I would serve this beer with a chicken dish, medium spiced with a clean side salad of radish, feta cheese, watercress and peach.
Barwa jasna, mocno się pieni. W aromacie bananowe, pszeniczne, czuć też niestety alkohol. W smaku pszeniczne, bananowe, miodowe, niestety za bardzo alkoholowe, ogólnie przeciętnie.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Cerveza blanca de levadura, dorada muy turbia con notas de color anaranjadas, densa corona de espuma persistente, de carbonatación media y toque dulce en paladar. Aroma y sabor a plátano en los primeros tragos. Buena.

Nachdem ich dieses Bier doch schon einige Male gtrunken habe, komme ich jetzt einmal dazu, es zu rezensieren. Dass es sich gerade um eine Dose aus der Ukraine handelt, finde ich dabei recht witzig.
Es ist ein unspektakuläres Weizen, das recht flach schmeckt im Vergleich zu den fruchtigen Aromabomben mancher bayrischer Mittelstandsbrauereien.
Was es ist: leicht und erfrischend süffig aber auch schnell langweilig
Sicher kein Spitzenbier, aber wohl ein trinkbares helles Weizen.
Muy buena cerveza Alemana, obscura, servida en jarra para sentir su buen sabor y disfrutar su espuma, los toques frutales le dan un dulce-amargo muy agradable.
Orange color, big foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.

Sans nul doute mon "Hefe" favorite avec la Weihenstephaner tout juste devant.
Mousse crémeuse et onctueuse, insiste et persiste en bouche sur les agrumes. Parfaite à table, consistante en raison du blé bien présent, on sent très peu l'alcool.

Draft at Leonardo Hotel Frankfurt City South, Frankfurt, Germany. Pours fully hazy, orange gold, with a good head of white foam, fine. Aroma is fruity, banana in particular. Body is average, with moderate carbonation. Taste is elegantly sweet. Finish is average in length.
It has a sweet yet a little bit bitter taste , a nice orange color and a medium carbonation.
Had this on tap in Oslo norway. Pours very hazy lots banana and cloves nice beer but I expect  not to get again.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.

Bottle at home from Marks and Spencer, 14th October 18. Pours a nice light orange, off clear, typical big head. Aroma is banana, clove and spice, yeast. Taste is refreshing, yeasty, some banana, spice, citrus. Pretty good.
Color naranja oscuro. Espuma blanca con muy buena retención. Aroma a cereales, platano y un poco floral. Sabor a cereal, pan, platano. Textura sedosa aunque chispeante.

Hell bernsteinfarben, trüb mit stabiler Krone. Minimal fruchtiger und herb-säuerlicher Geruch. Ebenso herb-säuerlicher Antrunk mit leichter Nelkennote. Danach präsentiert sich der Weißbier-Klassiker erschreckend aromenleer: kaum fruchtige Hefenoten, kein (Weizen)Malzgeschmack. Dafür pappige Hopfenpellets und eine metallische Note im Abgang. Gemessen am hervorragenden dunklen Weißbier eine echte Enttäuschung.
Het perfecte weissbier! geel/troebel van kleur en de smaak van brood/graan en op de achtergrond banaan en kruiden. -backlog de BierApp-

One of my favs.

Drank a bit of it in Germany.

A bit expensive here but enjoy 3 or 4 beers.
Never had a session on it.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji. W aromacie i smaku banan, w tle guma balonowa. Całkiem lekkie, przyjemne.
From backlog. On tap at Yardhouse LINQ Hotel Las Vegas. Cloudy Golden with white head. Malts, hops, yeast.
Lekker wit biertje met 5,5% alcohol uit München. Gelijkaardig aan een Hoegaarden speciaal
Found in bottle from restaurant in Tarnow, Poland. Slightly hazy appearance with a pleasant flavor. Good summer day option.

50cl can at home. Appearance: hazy golden with stable, fairly big white head. Aroma: wheat, nutmeg/clove, banana, apricot jam. Taste: above medium sweetness and medium bitterness. Notes of banana, clove, nutmeg, sweet malts and some stonefruits. 
Palate: medium bodied, oily texture and medium carbonation. Overall: very good. Complex aroma and smooth taste. Favorite Hefeweizen so far!

Pours an almost clear pale golden with a very large frothy white head. Aromas of esters, bananas, minerals, wheat. Taste is estery and fruity with bready notes. Mouthfeel is light bodied with moderate carbonation and slightly creamy.

Bottle. Tulip glass. Excellent head, eggshell white. Im also getting lacing around the glass. Notes of white peppercorn, grapefruit, banana and a little vanilla.  Finishes strong with a delicious nutmeg and bitter honey finish. Best wheat beer on the market. Lasts long too. First review of a "classic" beer. Prost!
Draft: Big white head.  Cloudy medium amber.  Aroma sweet and fruity (pineapple tangerine).  Taste of heavy clove, bananas.
Эталонный массмаркетовый вайцен, немецкая классика как она есть. По стабильности качества из общедоступных пшеничек находится на ступень выше Францисканера

500ml bottle, bought at local supermarket.

Pours an appetizing cloudy amber colour, with a thick off-white head that slowly thins out. No visual signs or carbonation bubbles at all.
Great, decently complex aroma of banana, fresh dough and cereals that slowly turn into malts and hops.
On tasting you are welcomed by a medium body with extremely creamy texture and really pleasant sweet banana and cereals taste, really mild carbonation and a long, oily finish where the hops bitterness shines through.

Overall, a really good beer, one of the best that are widely available around me (Barcelona). Really good for drinking in almost any occassion.

Pri tomto pivku ma najviac prekvapila tmavooranzova farba,  nakolko som akosi zvyknuty, ze psenicne piva su svetlo zltej farby a bohata cistobiela jemna pena, ktora sa dlho drzi. Chutovo oproti ostatnym psenicnym, ktore som skusal trochu horkejsie a zaroven aj sladsie, avsak chutnejsie. Vydarene pivko.
złote, mętne, z obfitą pianą. Aromat bananowy. Smak podobny, bardzo fajna pszenica jak na ogolnodostepna

Smell - medium strong, malt, soft hops.
Foam - quite thin, soft, bit watery, some carbonation.
Taste - some carbonation, light, some bitterness, some sweetness.
Easy drinking.

Robe bien orangée, trouble sans être trop laiteuse, belle mousse assez tenace, très belle carbonation. Nez de froment, fruité (pêche, mandarine) et léger, avec une pointe acidulée. En bouche, c'est rafraîchissant, avec une petite acidité, et un goût fruité qui se fond dedans. L'amertume, très légère, se révèle après quelques gorgées, en fin de bouche. C'est agréable sans être particulièrement subtil. Une weizen sympa.
Helles Bernstein, naturtrüb. Leicht Banane und reife Früchte sowie Heu und Hefe, geschmacklich Getreide und florale Noten.
Hazy orange color, white head, fruity aroma of banana, citrus, spices and yeast, full body.

0,5 l bottle. Have this stuff permanently in my shelf since years, mainly for family members or visitors but never drank it under rating conditions. What a shame. Murky unclear golden, huge low tanned foamy head. Intensive fruity smell. Taste starts fruity, first orange, later more dry with orange, banana, some chewing gum and hints of sulfur. Yeast and wheat the whole time present in the second row. Typical summer stuff with high drinkability. Sure it´s an industrial product, but a good one.
A Classic weizen, never disappointed in Paulaner hefe-weizen. Always stock in my refrigerator.

Not the best hefe I’ve had but still pretty good. Just another beer down the ol pipe.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Ocena na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji, na potrzeby uzupełnienia profilu.

Découverte en pression à Vienne avec mon cher Appiantiqua.
Robe blonde translucide surmontée d'une mousse blanche assez persistante.
Le nez est sur les malts et céréales.
La bouche est à l'image du nez nous laissant sur un palais de faible longueur mais agréable.
Une bière blanche bien agréable en mangeant un bon Goulash!11,5/20

Dégustée en pression à Vienne en compagnie de mon petit Kittenbieer.
Température de début 6 à 7°.
Robe blonde translucide, mousse blanche.
Nez plaisant caractéristique des bières blanches.
Goût équilibré : malts, céréales.
Palais de faible longueur mais correct.
Une blanche efficace.
11,5/20

Bottle from Marks & Spencer, Manchester. Hazy amber with a bubbly-frothy head. Drank in the proper glass for this beer although 'ohne zitronen', which is the way I prefer these German beers. Steady weissbier with a pleasant drinking texture. Good nose.

Huge off white head stayed on a cloudy dark golden body.
Medium bodied, active on the palate.
Very fruity tasting with peach, banana & yeast.
Excellent!

500 ml can. Cloudy orange color with big white head. Smells yeast and banana. Taste are bananas with pineapple and little sour yeast notes and some dust. Wait where did that dust taste came from ? Aftertaste are average time wheat and pineapple and banana mix. I think I should buy next time bottle not a can. Any way tasty hefe I enjoy it.

Classic Bavarian Weizen and among the bes5 and most heavily marketed. Opaque beige/brown with a thick white head. Banana aroma. Taste is a blend of wheaty/grainy flavours, some fruit and banana. Good indeed.
Prima Duits witbier met een volle body. Citrus smaak en zeker niet bitter. Mooie volle schuimkraag.
Dobre piwo codzienne. Bananowe tak jak powinno być. Muszę w końcu znaleźć z nalewaka.
Piana obfita, barwa ciemno żółta, mętne. Aromaty bananów dominują, goździków mało. W ustach lekkie, pijalne, raczej wytrawne. Szału nie ma ale jest przyjemnie.
Tap @ hotel domizil, Ingolstadt. Pours a hazy golden colour beer with a medium head. Malty and yeasty with notes lemon and wheat. Dry finish.
Klasyka. Wysycenie wysokie, w zapachu zarówno goździki jak i banany. W smaku również ww. banany i goździki, bez rewelacji, ale klasyczny reprezentant stylu.

Wiele tu opinii ludzie nie lubiących pszeniczniaków. Trudno, aby były pozytywne, jeśli się nie lubi takiego piwa. Ja lubię i cenie Paulanera za świeżość, sesyjniść, owocowy (bananowy) posmak i cudowną barwę.

Klasyka stylu za którym nie przepadam. W aromacie mocno bananowe, aż za mocno. Ładna piana, mętna barwa - trudno się przyczepić. W smaku czuć znowu banana i tę męczącą weizenową nutę. Zbyt standardowe piwo. Wszytskie rzeczy za które nie lubię pszenicznych piw, tutaj są maksymalnie uwidocznione. Ale obiektywnie, na pewno jest dobrze. Po co tracić czzas na robienie piw w tym stylu.
Stevig witbier, een van de allerbeste in deze categorie. 5,5%. Dat kunnen ze, die Duitsers! In bekende halve liter fles.

Pours a hazy golden orange, lovely hint of banana, against it's competitors has a beautiful after taste, widely available in the Netherlands, as a mainstream wheat beer it easily rates highly against the likes of Hoegaarden, Wickse, Erdinger and Franziskaner, overall served ice cold Paulaner is a very enjoyable beer. Cheers 👌🏻

Bottle at home. A good pour with the "bladder infection" cloudiness that you expect from the style. A straight down the line weisse and absolutely perfect for another blindingly hot day. Not too much banana, not too sweet and a good bite to wake up the palate. All perfectly pleasant.

aroma: fruity yeast esters, banana
Cloudy orange colour, rich white head, great !
Moderate swee, almost without bitterness,banana, and bubble gum in taste, Medium body, 
short creamy, yeasty finish

Bottle. Hazy orange. Smells of wheat, bubble gum, fruity yeast esters. Tastes of strong wheat sharpness, yeast fruit flavors, and a bubble gum and banana aftertaste. Medium body. Wheat gives it heft. Decent, though not my style.
mętne z pianą niczym bita śmietana, w zapachu banany i goździki, spoko weizen, jeden z fajniejszych
Excellent Beer, have enjoyed both bottle and on tap.  Definitely one of my go to German beers.
Mein beliebtes Bier. The HfB from Paulaner is one of the best market value easily available. Extra feature is that I wake up nicely after having drink too much of them at night.

On tap at Dubliner. Pours hazy golden yellow colour. Moderate white head. Notes of babana, slight sourness and yeasty notes in the aroma. Notes of banana, yeast, slight maltiness, hints of candysugar in the taste. Slightly yeasty notes in the aftertaste. Light bodied, classical weizen. Quite well drinkable.

Uiterlijk: geel/oranje met een volle witte kraag.
Geur: tarwe, gist, kruidnagel, banaan en honing.
Smaak: granig, banaan, perzik, honing.
Mond: lekkere volle smaak met redelijk veel koolzuur en een droge smaak met een vleug kruidnagel op het eind.
Of het nu -10 of +25 graden is, dit bier gaat er altijd wel in.

Bottle@summer cottage, from alko. Medium, organic nuances of wheat, some banana and a hint of minerals. Narrow taste spectrum and short aftertaste with wheat. Medium body and medium carbonation. Overall, balanced and organic but quite simple. 8 4 7 4 14
Bottle. Hazy with light amber color. Banana, yeast, light malts. Fairly dry with moderate bitterness and acidity. Quite low carbonation.
à la maison. Ce n'est pas la bière qui va révolutionner ce qu'on pense des bières mais c'est plutôt honnête. Petit goût citronné , arrière-goût de céréales. Désaltérant.

Bottle, 330 ml. Yeah, that's it! Amazing wheat beer form Munich. The brewery started production in 1634 by the order of monks called Saint Francis of Paola. This brand is one of the 6 presenting on Octoberfest, 6th best selling brand in Germany. Pours hazy, amber colour, off-white, tough foam, lasts forever. Amazingly complex nose with orange, herbal honey and citrus, caramel and vanilla bring sweetness and bitterness. This is the smell i want to eat immediately. Great and complex palate as well, mouthfully fruityness, less orange, more vibrant citrus notes. Very long aftertaste, 10 mins passed, and it's still there in the palate. Very great wheat beer, possibly the best German i've had so far. Highly recommended at least once in a month. Just simply perfect, i'm a huge fan of this beer.
Fles 50cl thuis. Fris bitter. Lichte tarwesmaak, zurig. Wat vlak. (6-2011).
Banana, cloves, wheat bread in aroma. Deep orange color with big white head. Wheat, banana in taste. Medium body, smooth, high carbonation.

0,5 can. It has a very nice orange unfiltered yellow color with a medium white head. The scent is fruity, delicate, complex. It tastes like real wheat beer notes. For me, it was a very, very good wheat beer at the right temperature. It also has notes of normal beer, with no unnecessary added material in it. Nice, delicious, recommended. Classic.
***
Nagyon szép narancsos szűretlen sárga színe van, közepes fehér hab. Az illata gyümölcsös, finom, összetett. Ízre az igazi búza sör jegyeket hozza. Számomra ez megfelelő hőmérsékleten egy nagyon-nagyon jó búzasör volt. Normáls sör jegyei is vannak, nincs felesleges hozzáadott anyag benne. Szép, finom, ajánlott.

Trübe, gelb orange Farbe mit großer, weißer Schaumkrone. Hefiger, fruchtiger Geruch. Geschmacklich hefig, fruchtig mit Banane, leicht hopfig, leicht malzig, leicht säuerlich. Leicht süß mit leichter Bitterkeit, mittlerer Körper mit aktiver Kohlensäure.
The aroma and the taste of that yeast is overwhelming, and I just don't happen to be able to drink it without cringing.

50 cl bottle @ home. Cloudy deep golden/orange color. Dense off white head with a 3 mm blanket retaining. Aroma's: wheat, banana. Retronasal it's banana, wheat-fruity, a bit clove, a bit sweet. Flavor is light sweet, light fruity sour. Light medium bodied. Finishes slightly dry with a touch of bitterness and fruit-candy. Hefeweizen at its finest.

Disappointing. However, in my past experience, Paulaner has been lighter than other weizens. But this one has a sour finish which is not appealing, and not to style. It's also supposed to be a Hefe-Weizen, but the banana, cloves and extra yeast is not really apparent. This was in a can, purchased from the discount end cap at an LCBO. According to the dates on the can, it should still have been good for several months, although weizenbier in general needs to be drunk fresh (so my bad, I guess).

Could it be that the ownership (including Heineken) are cutting corners? (Nah, that couldn't be it.)

Bottle 500ml at home. BBE 04.19. From S-market Pirkkala. Pours hazy yellow with white head. Wheat, light yeastiness, light citrus. Medium body,  watery texture, average carbonation.

Original rating 7-3-7-3-13 from bottle 500ml at holiday home 2009-03-07.

Hazy golden colour, big head with long retention, creamy lace. 
Aroma of cloves,  banana, citric notes, coriander.
Full body, creamy fruity palate. Strong carbonation. Sweet spicy finish. 
Taste just follows the aroma,  adding some pepper notes.
A classic of the style.
Good beer. Hazier. Decent head but dies quickly but leaves a nice lacing. Tastes fruity, obviously. Good beer, wish it had a little more alcohol content for the immense flavor but it’s good.

The first time I tried it, I remember thinking the tase was damn good, and quite unique and well balanced.   I just tried another 6 pack; At first I just had a pint. I have concluded this has to be one of my favorite tasting beers ever. It extraordinary, I would say.

Pours hazy light orange with a nice solid slightly off-white head. Smoky, yeasty, earhy and light metallic aroma. Wheat, straw, clove, bread, general fruitiness, but only light notes of banana and oranges. Good light to medium sweetness, light bitterness, light sourness. Medium body, slick texture, astringent finish.
Mutna boja i jaka pjena..fin okus i miris..veoma dostupno u Zagrebu kako u kaficima tako i u ducanima

Bottled and on tap. Pours a pale straw gold with a white head. Aroma: wheat, straw, mild citrus, grain and mild floral notes. Taste: wheat, straw, mild orange, very mild herbal and spice flavours. Medium bodied. Moderate carbonation. Mild sweetness with a mildly bitter finish. This is quite good.
Orange gold color with foamy head. Aromas of yeast and barley. Also yeasty taste with a light sweet aftertaste. Medium body and carbonation. Overall a good weiss.
23. 4. 2018, Cavallino, Ljubljana. Bottled. Classical Heffeweizen, banana aroma and flavoured with light body feel. Predominantly sweet, heavy carbonation. Nice Heffe.

.5l bottle poured a hazy golden beer. Thick creamy head. Aroma and taste are good but nothing special. Nose is wheat; barley; hop; banana. Taste is somewhat the same. Mouthfeel is thick and creamy. I really like this style of beer;
La más comercial de las cervezas de trigo. Y por su calidad una de las mejores. Muy rica. Mucha banana, mucho pan, incluso clavo de olor. Para tener siempre.

Bottle, pours hazy golden orange with thick off white head, good lacing, aromas of yeast, banana bread and spice, medium carbonation, tastes of banana, yeast & clove with a hint of citrus, good wheat beer
FANTASTIQUE ! Très gazeuse avec une longueur tirant sur la banane. très bonne bière blanche.

Estilo: Weizenbier 
Origem: Alemanha
Teor Alcoólico: 5,5%
IBU: 12
Volume: 500ml

Aparência: amarela ouro, turva, com espuma branca cremosa de ótima formação e estabilidade. 
Aroma: frutado, que remete a banana, condimentado remetendo a cravo, e panificação. 
Paladar: dulçor médio/alto, amargor baixo e leve acidez, notas condimentadas se destacam mais, mas também traz o frutado e os cereais do aroma, corpo médio, textura cremosa e carbonatação média e adequada. 
Aftertaste: voltam os aromas de cravo e banana, além do dulçor da cerveja. 

Impressão geral: Uma das cervejas mais emblemáticas da escola alemã, com destaque para a técnica de serviço e linda espuma cremosa. Todos esses elementos a tornam uma cerveja inesquecível. Além disso, por não ser filtrada, é turva, traz aromas característicos de banana e cravo, textura cremosa e paladar prioritariamente doce.

I've seen this beer in the lcbo for a long time now and I finally decided to try it. I'm pleased. This is probably the sweetest beer I've ever had. A full body Hefeweizen pours hazy, deep gold in color. Huge white and creamy head with long retention, leaving lots of lacing. Flavors of banana, caramel, light cereal grain malts. I think this brew is very similar to Hacker Pschorr  Hefeweizen, but sweeter.
Not really a session beer, but still a nice sweet sipper.
Tall can lcbo TO.

If it weren't for Ratebeer, I would never had tried this. 
I'm not a big beer drinker, maybe once or twice during summer barbeques. I cut my teeth over 20 years ago on Killian's Red. Drank cheap ice beers to get hammered, Rolling Rock on hot summer days. I've tried all the main 'big name' beers.

This is phenomenal! Flavors are pretty much what other reviews have said. It's smooth, nicely textured, with complex flavors. 

Thank you Ratebeer...this Paulaner is the best beer I've ever had. Sure it's not as cheap as Blatz to get hammered on, but it's a lot better tasting and more enjoyable.

Next step is to get a Weizen glass to drink it from.

Nov 2018 update...
This is still my go to beer. I have a few proper glasses to drink it from now, and it's great! 

On a couple of occasions, I wasn't able to get it from my local store (they were out). I tried Hacker-Pshorr Weissbeir. Being made at the Paulaner brewery, I figured they would be similar. They are indeed similar. But I found the Hacker-Pschorr to be slightly more bitter, and not as creamy on the palette. I'd gladly drink it again, it is a great beer, but I'd rather have the Paulaner. 

Another time, I was unable to get either of the above. I decided I would give Blue Moon a try. While not a bad beer, it can not compete with either of these weissbiers. I'd much prefer it over something like Oberon or any Laguanitas though.

Lo mejor que se puede adquirir en el supermercado más cercano aquí en España.
Estilo único. Marrón oscuro, espuma dulce igual que su aroma, también afrutado. 
Gran combinación de malta de calidad con sabor a trigo, fruta y dulce
Grandísima apariencia.
Great example f the style just what you expect from a good heff banana clove slight sourness very drinkable.

Large head, stays well, dark golden colour, cloudy/opaque in the glass, small bubbles moderatley lively. Nose bannanas, cloves, wheat. Medium body, foamy in the mouth, tingly on the tongue mildy lively, bannanas & cloves on the way down, wheaty after taste. Good example of wheat beer lacks some of the class/smoothness of better examples. Solid bber.

Hazy orange colour with a big foamy tan head. Fresh aroma of orange peel, banana, grass and hops. Mild sweet taste, hints of bread, orange and hops. Slicky texture, medium body, light bitter aftertaste. Very good, enjoyable from start to end.
Good weiss beer with strong wheat taste. I was supprised to find such a good beer in local T Market shop in Bulgaria. Nice can too - very beautiful.

Classica birra weiss tedesca fatta  secondo i canoni classici delle birre di questo genere. Colore dorato intenso e morbidissima schiuma bianca abbondante. Aroma e sapore di malto di frumento e lievito e qualche sentore di banana. Ottima su pasti leggeri o d'estate, poiché dissetante.
Bardzo przyjemne i aromatyczne pszeniczne piwo. Wyczuwalne smaki bananów i z lekka goździków. Jak na piwo raczej koncernowe to bezapelacyjne bardzo smaczne.

33 cl. bottle. Hazy orange with white frothy but quickly disappearing head. Aroma is quite light with wheat, clove, banana and hints of citrus. Taste has medium sweetness and light sourness -- I can feel some cloves. It is light to medium bodied and oily textured with lively carbonation. I really liked its astringent aftertaste. Overall, a solid Hefeweizen but not among the best ones in my opinion.

Великолепное пиво, если найти в Пятёрочке за 100 рублей. Нестареющая классика. Цветочный аромат. Стойкая мелкопузырчатая 
пенная шапка. Классический вкус немецкого хефевайцена. На первом плане солодово-цветочные нотки, на заднем плане приятный, обрамляющий хмель. Послевкусие умеренное Отличное пиво как для новичка, так и для опытного пользователя немецких вайценов.
Nie znam się. Nie wiem o co chodzi z tym piwem. Nie ma nic ani w aromacie, który jest słodowy i pszeniczny, ani w smaku, który jest nijaki.
100 Р — брать за эту и бóльшую цену! Топовый вариант пшеничного нефильтрованного из Германии. Наверное, это классика.

Et ganske godt øl, passer til det meste av mat. Også behagelig som tørstedrikk.

Prakticky tady přidávám tento komentář, jen aby tady něco bylo, protože zpětně dopisuji 900 piv z mého seznamu a asi bych se musel u toho zbláznit.

Has a grassy smell to it. Some banana and clove as well. On the tongue, those familiar hefeweizen tastes are much milder. Taste has some pilsner elements to it, but obviously more richly malt taste. Very slight vegetable chewiness. Excellent beer. I'm not sure I'll be standing an American hef up next to it any time soon.
Golden, hazy, good foam. Banana and coriander, but somehow emptish. Body could be higher. Dry, close to sour aftertaste. Not as full as it should be.
oprava zleho hodnotenia. v sokolovni trencin. vona nie moc prijemna. chut klasika kyslasta na konci tiez ostava
Scoort hoog als gemiddelde, maar ik vind hem eigenlijk niet echt bijzonder.
The rating is based on memories. Drinked before setting up an account on ratebeer.
Aroma is wheat malt, clove and pear compote. Wheat and pear compote follows in the taste and finish.

Tap. Hazy orange color with white head. Aroma is cloves, not so much bananas. Taste is cloves, bananas, mineralic finish. Silky mouthfeel with medium carbonation. Surprisingly little banana and surprisingly strong minerals for a South Bavarian Weizen. A bit too harsh.
Lane wygląda wprost epicko. Sesyjne, wyraziste, pełne piwo. Owocowe, karmelowe, słodkie, ale nie do przesady. (Ocena przeniesiona z innego piwnego portalu).

Tap @ Piwiarnia Warka, Mielec  
 Pomarańczowy kolor, mocno zamglony na całej powierzchni.
Piana biała, obfita o drobno pęcherzykowatej strukturze.
Długi czas pozostaje na powierzchni. Maluje liczne firanki na szkle.
W aromacie zboże, banany, estry owocowe, lekka cytrynka, goździki, guma balonowa.
W smaku dużo pszenicy, zboża, goździków, nut bananów, a z tyłu cytrusów. Lekko pikantne tło.
Dość słodkie w odbierze, bez goryczki, umiarkowane ciało i wysoka pijalność.
Klasyka gatunku.
A classic example of a true weizen beer. Golden color with thick white head. Aroma of clove and bananas well balanced. Very drinkable and thirst quenching. Great one
The rating is based on memories. Drinked before setting up an account on ratebeer.

Plenty of bananas, some cloves, a bit of wheat/yeast. Pours cloudy yellow-orange with large head. In taste mild banana, some citrus, some cloves, mild bitterness. Smooth body, fairly high carbonation. Good stuff.
Hefe weissbier. Torbida . Non filtrata. Cugina della Franziskaner che mi piace tanto . Ottima con pizza. Scende che è un piacere per chi ama le weiss.

50cl bottle at home. Pours a hazy amber colour with a medium white head. Aroma of banana, spices, coriander, malt, citrus. Taste is medium sweet, moderate bitter with a soft dry finish. Notes of spices, wheat, malt, yeast, banana, coriander, citrus. Texture is oily, medium to light bodied with moderate carbonation

Butelka 11.18
Aromat: lekki owoc, banan, jakby kwaśnawe, bardzo ładny
Wygląd: piana drobna, obfita, piwo mętne, złote
Smak: półwytrawne, gładkie, bardzo orzeźwiające, dość pełne, bardzo smaczne

Good classic wheat, some banana flavors, not as strong as in some others, spicy yeastiness. Nice example of the style without surprises, for better and worse.

Excelente Cerveza!!! Tiene cuerpo y sabor. Una buena opción para tomar en cuenta
